content:
@Lloyd McKenzie how's the template work coming along?

I'm fixing the issue with our custom extension which has prompted me to get the name right - it's now http://hl7.org/fhir/tools/StructureDefinition/resource-information not http://tools.hl7.org/StructureDefinition/resource-information
Slowly. And I go poof starting Fri. night. What is the property to use to tell the IG Publisher what folders to search for resources (and spreadsheets)?
I don't really want to enumerate the spreadsheets, I just want to point to folders where resources and spreadsheets might be found.
No you probably don't but it's quite a change, and I'm not really interested in making spreadsheets easier
I guess I can just have them create a text file of relative spreadsheet paths and transform that into the IG format required. That's not too painful.
(you can hear how much I care)
